inclusion.criterion: histological severity of chronic hepatitis C
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: hepatitis C patients who underwent previous therapy for their liver disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic viral hepatitis and steatosis and steatohepatitis. He is on IFN (100 mg/week) plus RBV (400 mg/day) combination therapy for the past 9 months.
